marital-status.marital-status: What is your current marital status?
marital-status.primary-help-message: Make sure the information matches what is on file with the Canada Revenue Agency.
marital-status.provide-sin: Enter your spouse or common-law partner's name exactly as shown on their Social Insurance Number (SIN) record.
marital-status.required-information: We need this information to calculate your family income. Your spouse or common-law partner must fill out their own application for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
marital-status.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.confirm-required: Consent from spouse or common-law partner is required to proceed
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Enter year of birth, for example 1950
error-message.yob-is-past: Year of birth too far in the past
error-message.yob-is-future: Year of birth must be in the past

radio-options.delegate: I am applying on behalf of someone else as a legal delegate or Power of Attorney
radio-options.personal-and-child: I am applying for myself and my child(ren)

error-message.type-of-application-required: Select who this application is for

application-delegate.page-title: Applying on behalf of someone as a legal delegate or Power of Attorney
application-delegate.contact-representative: You must speak to a Service Canada representative if you are applying on behalf of someone as their legal delegate or Power of Attorney. You can contact Service Canada by calling 1-833-537-4342 or by visiting a <contactServiceCanada>Service Canada Centre</contactServiceCanada> near you.
application-delegate.prepare-to-apply: <preparingToApply>Preparing to apply on behalf of someone</preparingToApply>

terms-conditions.page-heading: Terms and conditions of use and privacy notice statement
terms-conditions.intro-text: Thank you for using the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) Online Application ("the Online Application"). We have developed important terms and conditions for using this service ("Terms"). Please read them carefully.

terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-legal-terms: PLEASE READ CAREFULLY. These Terms for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) Online Application contain information about your legal rights and obligations and regulate your use of the Online Application. These Terms should be read in conjunction with the Canada.ca website Terms and Conditions. In case they are differing, the present Terms take precedence over Canada.ca Terms and Conditions.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-access-terms: Your access to and use of the Online Application including any and all content is subject to (1) your acceptance of and (2) your compliance with these Terms.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-usage-terms: Every time you use the Online Application, these Terms will apply. By using the Online Application, you agree to abide by the following Terms. It is your responsibility to understand and retain these Terms.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-outage: There will be times when the system might be down for maintenance.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-timeout: If you are inactive for 15 minutes on the Online Application, your session will end and you will lose any information you entered.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.terms-rejection-policy: At any time you may decide not to accept the Terms, in which case you will not be permitted to access and use the Online Application.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.esdc-definition-clarification: In these Terms, "ESDC" refers to the Minister of Employment and Social Development, representing His Majesty the King in Right of Canada.

online-application.heading: Terms of Use for the Online Application:
online-application.self-agreement: Using the Online Application means that you have read and agree to these Terms and the Privacy Notice Statement. If, at any time, you withdraw your agreement to any of the Terms you must stop use of the Online Application.
online-application.on-behalf-of-someone-else: If you are using the Application on behalf of a child, by using the Online Application, you certify that you have all the necessary authority to agree to the Terms on behalf of that individual, and that you agree to the Terms on behalf of the individual you are representing.
online-application.at-your-own-risk: If you are using a shared computer or shared internet connection, you are using this service at your own risk, and you will need to keep any personal information safe. If you are using a public computer make sure to close the browser or log out when you are done.
online-application.msdc: ESDC uses services from Microsoft Corporation to run the Online Application. The Microsoft data centres used by ESDC are in Canada in accordance with <microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>Microsoft Corporation's Terms of Service Agreement</microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>.
online-application.antibot: ESDC uses hCaptcha anti-bot services for our online tools in accordance with hCaptcha's <hcaptchaTermsOfService>Terms of Service</hcaptchaTermsOfService>.

changes-to-these-terms-of-use.heading: Changes to these Terms of Use
changes-to-these-terms-of-use.esdc-terms-amendment-policy: ESDC may amend these Terms at any time and without notice. Such changes shall be effective immediately on the date they are published. By using the Online Application, you agree to abide by the amended Terms. You are responsible to ensure you understand and retain the amended Terms.

personal-information.heading: Personal Information
personal-information.service-canada-application-administratio: The personal information collected in this application is required for the purposes of applying for the Canada Dental Care Plan (CDCP). Service Canada, which is part of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), administers applications for the CDCP on behalf of Health Canada. Service Canada will collect the personal information you include in your CDCP application to register and enroll you into the Plan. If you do not provide your personal information, you will not be considered for the CDCP.
personal-information.policy-analysis: ESDC may use or share the information you provide for policy analysis, research, monitoring and/or evaluation activities within ESDC, Health Canada and Statistics Canada. These uses or activities will not result in any administrative decisions made about you.
personal-information.collection-use: The collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information is authorized by, among other laws, the <cite>Department of Health Act</cite>, the <cite>Dental Care Measures Act</cite>, the <cite>Department of Employment and Social Development Act</cite>, and is protected by the provisions of the <cite>Privacy Act</cite>.
personal-information.microsoft-policy: ESDC carries out this application process using services from a third-party provider, Microsoft Corporation, which may be subject to foreign laws. For more information, see <microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>Microsoft Data Privacy Policy & Privacy Principles</microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>.

how-we-protect-your-privacy.heading: How we protect your privacy
how-we-protect-your-privacy.personal-information-rights-and-access: You have the right to the protection of, access to, and where applicable, the correction of your personal information. It is kept in the following personal information banks (PIBS):
how-we-protect-your-privacy.info-source-access: You can learn how to access this information in the government publication called <infosource>Info Source</infosource>. You can also access Info Source online at any Service Canada Centre.
how-we-protect-your-privacy.personal-information-handling-complaint-: If you do not agree with the way your personal information was handled by ESDC, you can contact the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada (OPC) to <fileacomplaint>file a complaint</fileacomplaint>.

government-of-canada-and-sun-life.heading: Government of Canada and Sun Life
government-of-canada-and-sun-life.share-info: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) may share your personal information with Health Canada (HC), the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), and Sun Life to administer the plan, validate your eligibility, and register you for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP).
government-of-canada-and-sun-life.disclose-info: Your information may also be disclosed to the CDCP benefits administrator (Sun Life), the benefits administrator's agents, and service providers for the purpose of underwriting, verification, administration, adjudication and investigation of claims under the CDCP.
government-of-canada-and-sun-life.sun-life-authorization: Sun Life is authorized to collect, use, and disclose information about you to any person or organization, including oral health providers, institutions, investigative services, and the CDCP, for the purposes of program administration, audit, claims and patient/client safety.

sharing-of-information-and-oral-health-p.heading: Sharing of information and Oral Health Providers
sharing-of-information-and-oral-health-p.enrol-consent: By enrolling in the CDCP, you are also providing consent to your oral health providers to disclose all personal information, as authorized by the <cite>Department of Health Act</cite> and the <cite>Dental Care Measures Act</cite>, that may be considered useful by Sun Life in the context of program administration, conducting claims verifications, managing claims, and patient/client safety. This information may include, but is not limited to, details on the services provided, patient clinical data, payments, and X-rays.
sharing-of-information-and-oral-health-p.considered-minor: If you are considered a minor in your province or territory, your information can also be shared with your parents or legal guardians.
sharing-of-information-and-oral-health-p.analysis: ESDC may use or share the information you provide for policy analysis, research, monitoring and/or evaluation activities within ESDC, Health Canada and Statistics Canada. These uses or activities will not result in any administrative decisions made about you.

apply.application-participation: Participation in the CDCP is voluntary. However, if you do not provide your personal information in your application, you cannot be considered for the CDCP.
apply.application-consent: By continuing with this application, you agree that you have read and accept the above terms and conditions and privacy notice statement. You also consent to the sharing of your personal information for the purposes listed above.

checkboxes.acknowledge-terms: I have read the Terms and Conditions.
checkboxes.acknowledge-privacy: I have read the Privacy Notice Statement.
checkboxes.share-data: I consent to the sharing of data.
checkboxes.do-not-consent: I do not agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Notice Statement and do not consent to the sharing of my information for the purposes listed above.

error-message.acknowledge-terms-required: You must read the Terms and Conditions to proceed
error-message.acknowledge-privacy-required: You must read the Privacy Notice Statement to proceed
error-message.share-data-required: You must consent to the sharing of your data to proceed
error-message.consent-required: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Notice Statement, and consent to the sharing of your information. To apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan, you must agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Notice Statement. You must also consent to the sharing of your personal information for the purposes listed.

dental-insurance.title: Access to private dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Do you have access to private dental insurance or coverage through any of the following:
dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, I have access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, I do not have access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.dental-insurance-eligibility-confirmatio: I understand that I am not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan if I have access to dental insurance or coverage.

additional-info.title: What does it mean to have access to private dental insurance or coverage?
additional-info.eligible: This also applies even if you choose not to enrol in, do not use, or have to pay a premium for private dental insurance or coverage.
additional-info.access: Having access to dental coverage through the Canadian Dental Care Plan or other federal, provincial or territorial government social programs is not considered as having access to private dental insurance.

alert.title: Private dental insurance confirmation
alert.body: If you have access to private dental insurance or coverage, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan. If you are a current member and continue with the application, your benefits will end immediately.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether you have access to dental insurance
error-message.dental-insurance-eligibility-confirmatio: Select whether you understand that if you have private dental insurance you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan

new-or-returning-member.previously-enrolled: Are you currently, or have you ever been enrolled in the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
new-or-returning-member.member-id: Canadian Dental Care Plan Member ID
new-or-returning-member.member-id-description: You can find your 11-digit Member ID in the upper right corner of the letter from Service Canada or on your Canadian Dental Care Plan member card.

error-message.is-new-or-existing-member-required: Select whether you have ever been enrolled in the Canadian Dental Care Plan

personal-information.form-instructions-sin: Enter your name exactly as shown on your Social Insurance Number (SIN) record or Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) letters.
personal-information.form-instructions-info: We'll use the information you provide to confirm your identity. Any information that does not match the information on your SIN or CDCP record may cause a delay in the processing of your application.
personal-information.single-legal-name: If you have one legal name
personal-information.name-instructions: If you have only one legal name, enter it in both the first and last name fields.

error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.first-name-no-digits: First name must contain letters only
error-message.last-name-no-digits: Last name must contain letters only
error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year

alert.heading: You cannot apply at this time.
alert.detail: Based on the date of birth provided, you are not able to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan at this time.

confirm-dental-benefits.title: Access to other government dental benefits
confirm-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
confirm-dental-benefits.has-benefits: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal, provincial or territorial social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
confirm-dental-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
confirm-dental-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits

error-message.federal-provincial-territorial-benefit-r: Select whether you have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits

dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

living-independently.description: Living independently from your parents means you are 16 or 17, do not receive financial support from your parents, and your primary residence is different from theirs.
living-independently.form-instructions: Do you live independently from your parents?

error-message.living-independently-required: Select whether or not you live independently from your parents

parent-or-guardian.page-title: Parent or legal guardian needs to apply
parent-or-guardian.unable-to-apply: You are under 18. A parent or legal guardian must apply on your behalf.
parent-or-guardian.apply-for-yourself: If you have previously applied for a child, and now want to apply for yourself, you must speak to a Service Canada representative. Contact Service Canada by calling <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>.

phone-number.dont-have-number: I don't have a phone number
phone-number.need-phone-number: You need a phone number to apply online. If you cannot be reached by phone, you can still apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan:
phone-number.service-canada: By phone: call Service Canada at <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>

error-message.phone-number-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front
error-message.phone-number-alt-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front

home-address.use-mailing-address: My mailing address is the same as my home address

address-field.address-note: Include apartment number (if applicable), street number, street name. For example: 123 Main St. Suite 4B

communication-preferences.preferred-method: How would you like Sun Life to communicate with you?
communication-preferences.preferred-method-help-message: Sun Life will be responsible for handling member enrolment and claims processing for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
communication-preferences.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?
communication-preferences.by-email:
By email
Signing up for email is the fastest way to get updates.
communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method: How would you like to receive updates from the Government of Canada about the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method-msca:
Online through My Service Canada Account (MSCA)
Signing up for online notifications is the fastest way to get updates.
communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method-mail:
By mail
You can also view your Canadian Dental Care Plan information in your MSCA..

error-message.preferred-method-required: Select preferred method of communication for Sun Life
error-message.preferred-notification-method-required: Select preferred method of communication for the Government of Canada

email.provide-email: Provide the email address you'd like the Government of Canada and Sun Life to use to contact you about your Canadian Dental Care Plan coverage.
email.verify-email: We will need to confirm your email address.

error-message.email-required: Enter email address, for example name@example.com
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

verify-email.verification-code: An email with a code has been sent to {{email}}. Please enter the 5-digit verification code and select "Continue".
verify-email.request-new: It may take up to 60 seconds for the email to arrive. If you do not see it, check your junk or spam folder. If you still do not have the code, you can request a new one.
verify-email.unable-to-verify: If you are not able to verify your email, select “Back” to update the email address  or <communicationLink>modify your communication preference</communicationLink>.

error-message.verification-code-max-attempts: You have entered an incorrect verification code more than 5 times. You must request a new code using the "Request new verification code" link below.

verification-code-alert.heading: The verification code entered does not match the code that was sent to the email address provided, or the code has expired.
verification-code-alert.detail: Please check the code and try again. If the issue continues, you can request a new code using the "Request new verification code" link below.

code-sent.heading: New verification code
code-sent.detail: A new verification code has been sent to {{email}}.

information.single-legal-name: If the child has one legal name
information.name-instructions: If the child uses one legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.
information.sin-legend: Does this child have a Social Insurance Number (SIN)?
information.sin-no: No, this child does not have a SIN
information.parent-legend: Are you the parent or legal guardian of this child?

parent-or-guardian.page-title: You must be a parent or legal guardian
parent-or-guardian.must-be: You must be a parent or legal guardian.
parent-or-guardian.unable-to-apply: You are not able to apply for this child. You must be a parent or legal guardian to apply on behalf of a child.

cannot-apply-child.ineligible-to-apply: Your child is 18 years or older. Your child must submit their own application to the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
cannot-apply-child.eligibility-info: If your child is a dependant adult and you are their legal delegate or Power of Attorney, you must speak to a Service Canada representative to apply on their behalf. You can contact Service Canada by calling <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>.

confirm-dental-benefits.title: {{childName}}: access to other government dental benefits

confirm-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
